  • HubBoxx - Enterprise Hub and Web Product Manager
  • Features Details
  • User Management

User ManagementÔÉÅ

The User section allows admin to create, manage and monitor user accounts.

Available Functions include:

  • Manage User Accounts.

  • Delete User Accounts.

  • Generate Cpanel Webmail Accounts.

  • Generate AfterLogic Webmail Accounts.

  • Delete Cpanel Webmail Accounts.
